title: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 if no webapps deployed
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content, instead of the expected HTTP error 404. This behavior is not consistent with the desired behavior.
OB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I receive an HTTP response with a code of 200 OK but no content.
EB: When I start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and access a URL, I expect to receive an HTTP error response with a code of 404 Not Found.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Download Tomcat 7 from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the server
4. Observe the returned HTTP response code and content.
